[[size 50px]]##red|WHATS UP GAMERS##[[/size]]	
[[size 40px]]##orange|ITS ME##[[/size]]	
[[size 30px]]##yellow|THE ONE##[[/size]]	
[[size 35px]]##green|THE ONLY##[[/size]]	
[[size 20.75px]]##blue|KING OF THE HOMIES##[[/size]]	
[[size 18.75px]]##purple|DR VIKKIIIII LOST!!##[[/size]]	


[[image https://lounge.hexick.com/uploads/0a3f7e2415354741/image.png ]]
Image ID: A biblically accurate image showing the user claiming to be "Dr Vikki Lost"

[[collapsible show="INFORMATION" hide="- OOOOOO"]]
[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#f2f2c2; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
Me? What about me?

**Item #:** SCP-LOST

**Object Class:** Gay

**Pronouns:** It/They/He

**Special Containment Procedures:** 
SCP-LOST is to be contained in a 5x5x5 milliliter room and not understood or comprehended. It is to be provided with a laptop to write. Any personnel visiting the containment cell of SCP-LOST are to wear full protective gear, and never make eye contact. 

**Description:** 
SCP-LOST is a reality bender who contains a slight antimemetic property, preventing it from being understood or comprehended by others. Physically, SCP-LOST has been described as "possum-like", "ginger" and "OH MY FUCKING GOD WHAT IS THAT WHAT THE FUCK". The amount of eyes possessed by SCP-LOST are up for debate, but it is certainly not the correct amount. Do not question SCP-LOST. Bad things will happen.  

Though normally unresponsive to most stimuli, SCP-LOST will begin vibrating and humming at the phrases "Magnus Archives", "Nightvale", "My Hero Academia", "Lemon Demon", and "Possums". If engaged, it will began ranting about the mentioned topic until it collapses from lack of oxygen and it's own life choices.

SCP-LOST hates itself deeply, but has been known to show displays of what is assumed to be compassion to individuals who tolerate it's presence. 

[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="QUOTES" hide="AAAAAAA"]]
[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#f2f2c2; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]

Reviews from friends
[[*user djlolotis]] - "I like drlost articles 10/10 would drlost again"
[[*user JorgeMtzb]] "You want a quote? Sure! But first, may I ask why you are completely naked? And... OH GOD WHAT ARE YOU DOING WITH THAT CACTUS!!??"
[[*user Doctor Fullham]]  - "Hams are high in sodium content."
[[*user RadiantGold]]  - "i love sneks :]"
[[*user PoufyPoufson]] - "DrLost has been DrFound"
[[*user domileaf]] - "'Haven't Met You Yet' is the first single from Canadian singer Michael Bublé's fourth studio album, Crazy Love, released on August 31, 2009."
[[*user Boogey_Man23]] - "Boogey_Man23 could not be reached for comment at this time. (Yes, that is the quote)"
[[*user InnkeeperReori]] - "GLITTER SHOTGUN"
[[*user Everturning]] - “Heh, you’re lost? Just Everturn around! Heh heh heh”
[[*user dr blackbox]] - "728487277489506938948374948378492761749377485837279427627372748377473637"
